rows.label: qev014403_MSG0001
rows.name: Help me! Someone open this door![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014403_JNK0010
rows.name: Open

rows.label: qev014403_SEL0011
rows.name: Force the door open.

rows.label: qev014403_JNK0020
rows.name: Talk

rows.label: qev014403_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Ajoa what's going on.

rows.label: qev014403_MSG0002
rows.name:
Is someone there? Oh, thank you!
You're trying to get the door open, aren't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014403_MSG0003
rows.name: Well, you can stop. It won't open without a keycard.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014403_MSG0004
rows.name: Hello?! Oh, thank goodness you heard me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014403_MSG0005
rows.name:
The plant's doors stopped working, and now I'm
trapped in here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014403_MSG0006
rows.name:
The rest of the research team should be somewhere
in the facility. Can you please get a keycard from
one of them?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014403_MSG0007
rows.name:
And be carefulâ€”there are monsters running around
in here. If you find one, don't hesitate to kill it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014403_MSG0010
rows.name:
Oh, thank you! I can finally get out!
...It sounded like that thing was dying.
Were you the one who killed it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014403_JNK0030
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev014403_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Ajoa why she was trapped in there.

rows.label: qev014403_JNK0040
rows.name: Interrogate

rows.label: qev014403_SEL0041
rows.name:
Ask Ajoa whether she knows about the cocoons
surrounding the plant.

rows.label: qev014403_MSG0011
rows.name:
The intruder alarm went off, and everyone ran outside.
We heard a scream, and then Ian and I were attacked
by...something.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014403_MSG0012
rows.name:
Oh my God, Ian! Where is he? Where are the others?
Are they all right?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014403_JNK0050
rows.name: Answer

rows.label: qev014403_SEL0051
rows.name: Inform Ajoa that you didn't find anyone else.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014403_JNK0060
rows.name: Question

rows.label: qev014403_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Ajoa what attacked her.

rows.label: qev014403_MSG0013
rows.name:
Then how do you have a keycard? My friends are
the only ones who have those.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014403_MSG0014
rows.name:
And why are you even HERE? We weren't expecting
visitors, and I can't believe anyone would just show
up here out of the blue.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014403_MSG0015
rows.name: ...What? Rosie asked you to come?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014403_MSG0016
rows.name: Then I owe her for saving me, I guess...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014403_MSG0017
rows.name:
Do you hear that? It's a warning that something is
wrong with the plant![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014403_MSG0018
rows.name: I'm sorry, but could I ask you to go check it out?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014403_MSG0019
rows.name:
I'm going to look through the surveillance footage and
try to get an idea of what's happened.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014403_MSG0020
rows.name:
This horrific four-armed...thing came at us from
nowhere. It kept shrieking and shrieking and...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014403_MSG0021
rows.name:
It attacked me, and I blacked out.
When I woke up, I was trapped in here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014403_MSG0022
rows.name: But why are YOU here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014403_MSG0023
rows.name: ...What? Rosie asked you to come?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014403_MSG0024
rows.name: Then I owe her for saving me, I guess...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014403_MSG0025
rows.name:
Do you hear that? It's a warning that something is
wrong with the plant![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014403_MSG0026
rows.name: I'm sorry, but could I ask you to go check it out?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014403_MSG0027
rows.name:
I'm going to look through the surveillance footage and
try to get an idea of what's happened.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014403_MSG0028
rows.name: ...Eeek![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014403_MSG0029
rows.name:
You're saying it's like that outside as well?
But...that's crazy. None of that was here before.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014403_MSG0030
rows.name: And why are YOU here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014403_MSG0031
rows.name: ...What? Rosie asked you to come?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014403_MSG0032
rows.name: Then I owe her for saving me, I guess...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014403_MSG0033
rows.name:
Do you hear that? It's a warning that something is
wrong with the plant![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014403_MSG0034
rows.name: I'm sorry, but could I ask you to go check it out?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014403_MSG0035
rows.name:
I'm going to look through the surveillance footage and
try to get an idea of what's happened.[ST:wait ]
